updateFlow(address,address,int96,bytes).details: Update the flow rate between sender and receiver.

params.flowRate: New flow rate in amount per second. NOTE: - Only the flow sender may update the flow rate. - Even if the flow rate is zero, the flow is not deleted from the system. - Deposit amount will be adjusted accordingly. - No new gas fee is charged.
